about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in both, a world of adventure and language practicing at the same time!

The Secret of Puffin Cove is a conversational adventure game for Virtual Reality (VR). You set sail off the coast of south of England, where a charismatic pirate tour guide helps you on a journey to solve a huge mystery at Morwen Bay. Armed with a intermediary level of English and a taste for adventure, you chase a ghost story and navigate stormy weather to uncover the secret of Puffin Cove.

This the demo version of the chapter. We will be preparing an Early Access in October with an improved interface and a reporting system. There may also be more content included, like the boat ride scene.

Important:
You need to activate the Speech Recognition on your Windows 10 system before playing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Do you want to practice speaking English? What about talking with ghosts? In The Secret of Puffin Cove, we immerse you in a quirky world of adventures where you can practice conversation and with the help of our personalised report system, evaluate your speaking proficiency. Come with us and discover The Secret of Puffin Cove!
